page.title: 07MADELEY STAFFS : FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Families eat together in the evening unless fathers are away on business. Afterwards,the various members pursue individual ploys:study,hobbies,clubs, sport.Most watch TV together,or,since 4 channels offer choices,on separate sets Serials,soap-operas,crime stories,films are popular.So is sport! A few families make music together;others play records or go to concerts.Some play cards,or board or computer games.And many more. Popular outdoor activities are:walking exercising the dog,gardening,swimming, jogging & car-cleaning.In summer,people motor at weekends,to beauty spots with a picnic.On Sunday,they visit relatives entertain friends & a few attend church or chapel.It's no longer a day of rest. Many schools take parties of children abroad on holiday but mose families go away together, the wife's salary making possible more,longer trips,often abroad
